channel.desc: With Helen still bedridden, James struggles manfully with both chores and children as Siegfried and Tristan look on idly.

channel.title: The Black Forest Murders
channel.desc: Relentless detective work links the death of Berghoff to an unsolved murder in Austria. Deals with adult themes.

channel.desc: As Kramer is told to downsize the team, they finally get a solid lead. Deals with adult themes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Bob Servant
channel.desc: Sitcom originating from the Bob Servant books. Bob and Frank start a new chapter in their lives, and things go well until a woman comes between them. Contains some strong language.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Bob Servant
channel.desc: Sitcom originating from the Bob Servant books. Bob defends himself in court after a fracas with Hendo, but can he convince the jury of his innocence? Contains adult humour.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Bob Servant
channel.desc: Bob reacts badly when he learns that Frank has plans to marry and leave Broughty Ferry. Contains adult humour.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Good Life
channel.desc: Seventies sitcom about a self-sufficient couple in suburbia. Tom finds marketing his garden produce more difficult than he thought, especially when the rates are due.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Yes Minister
channel.desc: Sitcom about a British government minister and the advisers who surround him. Jim Hacker MP and Sir Humphrey learn of a plan that threatens them both.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Talking Pictures
channel.desc: Celia Imrie tells the story of Kirk Douglas's 1960 epic Spartacus and reveals how what was then the most expensive film of all time made it onto the big screen.

channel.title: Cricket
channel.desc: All the key moments from Bristol, where England take on the West Indies for the second T20 game of a three-match series.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Vienna Philharmonic
channel.desc: Sir Bryn Terfel, Juan Diego Florez and Yuja Wang are among guests in a star-studded gala featuring the music of Bizet and Ravel to mark the 150th anniversary of Palais Garnier.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Many Faces of Alison Steadman
channel.desc: Documentary in which actress Alison Steadman talks about her career, from her earliest appearances on screen. Featuring archive footage and testimony from friends and colleagues.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Alison Steadman Remembers... Girl
channel.desc: Alison Steadman tells the story of groundbreaking 1974 TV drama Girl. Once thought lost forever, the film later resurfaced, giving Alison the opportunity to share her memories.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Second City Firsts
channel.desc: 1970s drama. Just as she is about to leave the army, Jackie has an encounter with an old lover. Stars Alison Steadman in an early TV role. Contains language which some may find offensive.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Gateways Grind
channel.desc: Sandi Toksvig goes behind the iconic green door of one of the most famous lesbian venues in the world, The Gateways Club.
